title: Day 273: The Lord's Work (2022)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Fr. Mike continues discussing the call of Nehemiah and how we should approach the work the Lord calls us to do. He explains why all work is divine participation in God’s Kingdom on earth and encourages us to remember our service to God and to others, keeping our focus on serving and loving in the realm of our influence.  Today’s readings are Nehemiah 3, Zechariah 14, and Proverbs 20:23-26.
